name: Alexander Enos
heroSubtitle: engineering student â€¢ programmer â€¢ outdoors
aboutMe: I'm a born-and-raised Oregonian that has a passion for creating and understanding things. I graduated from SEHS in 2023 and currently attend college at LCC. I developed a pasion for creating things digitally by teaching myself programming. I also have interests in biology, health and food, hiking, mountain biking, finance, beekeeping, and landrace/natural farming.

achievements.title: Graduated Highschool
achievements.description: Was apart of IB IHS program for 3 years. I completed AP classes too.

achievements.title: Learning to Program
achievements.description: You can learn anything! Never let yourself think that you're not smart enough!

achievements.title: Attending College
achievements.description: I'm extremely grateful for this opportunity!

strengths.title: Algorithmic Thinking
strengths.description: Although I'm a sensitive and an emotional person, I can turn problems into a set of steps and repeatable instrucitons. I can identify pattersn and where things can be more efficient and think about thinks abstractly.

strengths.title: Understanding others
strengths.description: I can generally get a feeling for what others are thinking which helps me communicate easier.

strengths.title: Kindness & Empathy
strengths.description: I try and live by the golden rule, and try not to judge people or treat them differently. I try and be understanding of everyone and the place they're in.

strengths.title: Problem Solving
strengths.description: I'm always thinking, always questioning. I can break complex problems down into simpler ones and come up with solutions. I like to think to myself "Nothing is impossible" and there is "Always a way"

academics.title: Expanded Technical Definition
reflection: Write your first reflection paragraph here. Think about what you learned from this assignment, what challenges you faced, and how it helped develop your technical writing skills.
Write your second reflection paragraph here. Consider how this assignment connects to your academic goals, your strengths, or your career aspirations.

academics.title: Annotated Bibliography
reflection: Write your first reflection paragraph here. What was researching and annotating sources like? What did you learn about evaluating sources and synthesizing information?
Write your second reflection paragraph here. How did this assignment build on previous work? How might you use annotated bibliographies in the future?

academics.title: Formal Analytical Report
reflection: Write your first reflection paragraph here. What was the process of writing a formal analytical report like? What did you learn about data analysis and formal writing?
Write your second reflection paragraph here. How does this report demonstrate your growth as a technical writer? How does it connect to your larger goals?

programming.title: Indie Developer Simulator
programming.description: A 3D browser-based experience where you roleplay as a game programmer. Built from scratch with JavaScript and WebGL.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Role Title
volunteer.description: Describe your volunteer work, what you did, and what you learned from the experience.
